title: Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 4 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park Ukulele Lessons      Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM Location: Park Visitor Center Fees: Free     Monday, August 15, 2016 Every Monday Weekly  from 05/02/2016 to 12/26/2016  Beginning Ukulele Lessons View Details      Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park Geology Walk      Time: 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM Location: Geology Walk Fees: Free     Tuesday, August 16, 2016 Every Tuesday Weekly & Every Thursday Weekly  from 04/26/2016 to 12/29/2016 Learn about the unique geology of the park as well as the native plants and animals that live here! View Details      Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park Hula with Aunty Lani      Location: Park Visitor Center Fees: Free     Wednesday, August 17, 2016 Every Wednesday Weekly  from 04/27/2016 to 12/28/2016 Learn Basic Hula from Aunty Lani! View Details      Kaloko-Honokōhau National Historical Park Turtle Talks on the Beach      Time: 10:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: 'Ai'opio Fishtrap Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Every Saturday Weekly  from 04/16/2016 to 12/31/2016 Turtle Talk on the beach View Details              Children presenting Ho'okupu (Gifts) at annual Hawaiian Cultural Festival
